articles.title: Watch the asteroid 2023 CX1 turn into 'beautiful' fireball over Europe - USA TODAY
articles.description: Asteroid 2023 CX1 was spotted in Europe Sunday night and hours later the meteor was seen burning across the sky over France and throughout the region
articles.content:
An asteroid hit Earth hours after it was discovered Monday, turning into a dazzling fireball that was spotted throughout Europe.
